title: Futurama Seasons 1-4
description: Well, I made these a few years ago, best rips of the original 4 seasons (those of you counting broadcast seasons can bite my shiny metal ass), at least as near as I can tell, and in my opinion.  I am an obsessive fan of this series (Melllvar's knowledge of ST:TOS doesn't rival my Futurama lore mastery), and took great pains to make the best rips I could from the DVDs, when I still had them.  These were then lost, Season 4 was recovered from a USB drive fashioned into the likeness of my head, and at long last the remainder of my pretty pretty rips are here.  Please download, and enjoy, and seed these, you jive suckas.  They must be preserved.
